entry.p: As promised 6+ months ago, I've posted the text of the final essay to be included in my book Randian Reflections, entitled Nietzsche, Rand, and the Ethics of the Great Task. I hadn't intended to publish it for a few more months, but I was in the files fixing various markup issues (all of the chapters are now XHTML 1.1 compliant according to the W3C validator), so I figured I'd post the last chapter while I was at it. Now I just need to finish off The Tao of Roark (lots of notes but not much writing over the last few months) and I'll be done with my Rand-related projects. I'm looking forward to letting go of the ladder…
